text: Ronald Lyle Goldman (July 2, 1968 â€“ June 12, 1994) was an American restaurant waiter. He was a friend of Nicole Brown Simpson, the ex-wife of O. J. Simpson. He was murdered along with Brown at her home in Los Angeles, California, on June 12, 1994. Simpson was acquitted of their murders in 1995, but found liable for both deaths in a 1997 lawsuit. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Murders by blade weapons Category:American crime victims Category:People from Chicago Category:People from Los Angeles
title: Ron Goldman
